title: Canaan Online Shop
author: Canaan Online Shop
content: Hello all We need some slogans for our official online shop, such as: Mine the Future, Future of Mine.  If you have any good slogan, welcome to share with us, if your slogan is chosen, we can offer you a special coupon or a thanks gift

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: "Your soul is mining"pls send my gift to BTCaddress on my profile

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: Canaan Online Shop on July 15, 2022, 11:23:35 AMQuote from: Canaan Online Shop on July 15, 2022, 11:21:57 AM Hello all We need some slogans for our official online shop, such as: Mine the Future, Future of Mine.  If you have any good slogan, welcome to share with us, if your slogan is chosen, we can offer you a special coupon or a thanks gift We gonna post it on our banners. https://shop.canaan.io/You don't have to spam your thread you can just edit your thread and add additional info any slogan will do, both slogans that you have is good enough it's not the slogan but your reputation and the testimonials coming from your buyers that matter I would also like to ask since you have a thread here have you addressed your SEC issuesCrypto Mining Rig Maker Canaan Added to SEC List of Scrutinized Chinese CompaniesCanaan has until May 25 to dispute its inclusion, which could eventually force its delisting from the Nasdaq.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I don't think this is allowed here, not in service discussion. I have seen people get banned for posting giveaways that incentivize posting/replying in threadsPerhaps you can set up a simple slogan contest in the service board with a few rulesPick a leaf from a contest like this one https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403034.0

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on July 15, 2022, 11:55:08 AM"Your soul is mining"pls send my gift to BTCaddress on my profile OMG, No kidding

comments.author: Theones
comments.body: Quote from: Canaan Online Shop on July 15, 2022, 11:21:57 AM Hello all We need some slogans for our official online shop, such as: Mine the Future, Future of Mine.  If you have any good slogan, welcome to share with us, if your slogan is chosen, we can offer you a special coupon or a thanks gift what is the business about?Maybe I can help?Do you have a website where we can see what is your service or product about?

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: Quote from: Theones on August 01, 2022, 08:38:54 PMQuote from: Canaan Online Shop on July 15, 2022, 11:21:57 AM Hello all We need some slogans for our official online shop, such as: Mine the Future, Future of Mine.  If you have any good slogan, welcome to share with us, if your slogan is chosen, we can offer you a special coupon or a thanks gift what is the business about?Maybe I can help?Do you have a website where we can see what is your service or product about?Hi there, we are selling Avalon miners, our official shop link is https://shop.canaan.io/

comments.author: Theones
comments.body: Quote from: Canaan Online Shop on August 02, 2022, 08:31:32 AMQuote from: Theones on August 01, 2022, 08:38:54 PMQuote from: Canaan Online Shop on July 15, 2022, 11:21:57 AM Hello all We need some slogans for our official online shop, such as: Mine the Future, Future of Mine.  If you have any good slogan, welcome to share with us, if your slogan is chosen, we can offer you a special coupon or a thanks gift what is the business about?Maybe I can help?Do you have a website where we can see what is your service or product about?Hi there, we are selling Avalon miners, our official shop link is https://shop.canaan.io/Oh okie - I just had a look at your website. My mind is working now. What difference your product makes to the customer? How is business going bytheway?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Canaan Online Shop on July 15, 2022, 11:21:57 AM  If you have any good slogan, welcome to share with us, if your slogan is chosen, we can offer you a special coupon or a thanks gift Why don't you open a thread the same as this[1] on the Services board. But of course, you decide what will be the prizes. I also recommend to use an escrow to secure the fund or prize for the chosen winner.[1] [OPEN] Competition for the best slogan for Betnomi / Prize $100 in BTC!

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on August 08, 2022, 04:41:20 AMQuote from: Canaan Online Shop on July 15, 2022, 11:21:57 AM  If you have any good slogan, welcome to share with us, if your slogan is chosen, we can offer you a special coupon or a thanks gift Why don't you open a thread the same as this[1] on the Services board. But of course, you decide what will be the prizes. I also recommend to use an escrow to secure the fund or prize for the chosen winner.[1] [OPEN] Competition for the best slogan for Betnomi / Prize $100 in BTC!Yeah they should do that so people will take your question seriously if I have a good slogan for one company and it's not even a company where I'm a customer I would not even give it without compensation, a slogan is what defines a company or the goal of a project, companies, and projects get a hype on their slogan and it should not be free, a special coupon or a thanks gift is not sufficient the contributor will have to buy your product to use that gift.

comments.author: Rabi3
comments.body: Quote from: Canaan Online Shop on August 08, 2022, 01:12:51 PMThanks for your suggestion.Just to add some that came to my mind because why not, you can just use the idea to come up with one too "mine safer" "mine without a hassle" because mining crypto gets you wealth but without the risk and hassle of actual mining where you have to go inside caves that could collapse at anytime.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Robbing bitcoiners since 2009? Guess that's not really a good slogan but certainly true at times.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on August 09, 2022, 01:18:09 AMRobbing bitcoiners since 2009? Guess that's not really a good slogan but certainly true at times.A hurtful truth by seeing how huge this industry by scammers since they accumulate a large of money from innocent investors believe that there's something like this will give them infinite fortune because that's what they see upfront from those platform which gives return from their investments at early stage.By the way OP are you selling hardwares? If you want to get the best slogans why not try to follow what Betnomi did which they conduct a slogan campaign contest for sure you will get a lot of ideas about the best slogan on your company and you will have fun for the numbers of entries submitted by forum members here.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: I've always liked the seagulls from Finding Nemo: mine mine mine! You can add it as a mascot with the slogan.

comments.author: Canaan Online Shop
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on August 09, 2022, 01:06:25 PMI've always liked the seagulls from Finding Nemo: mine mine mine! You can add it as a mascot with the slogan.Oh, is it a movie? I need to check it out then.
